title: Hooptie World Championship
overview: Hooptie World Championship is a race series like no other with 6 two-person teams of enthusiastic drivers from across the country converging in Tucson, Arizona, at the Pima County Fairgrounds with their hoopties in tow. This is the beginning of one wild and unpredictable journey into vehicular mayhem and chaos hosted by industry icons David Freiburger and KJ Jones. Let the hooptie havoc begin!
